attributes.action: Replace the unelected house of lords with a public vote or veto
attributes.background: Give the people the chance to govern them selves and create a better future in a responsible and  democratic way.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition asking for the House of Lords to be replaced with a publicly elected body:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163717
